title: Mandiant's Twitter account hacked to push cryptocurrency scam
description: The Twitter account of American cybersecurity firm and Google subsidiary Mandiant was hijacked earlier today to impersonate the Phantom crypto wallet and share a cryptocurrency scam. [...]

title: Hacker hijacks Orange Spain RIPE account to cause BGP havoc
description: Orange Spain suffered an internet outage today after a hacker breached the company's RIPE account to misconfigure BGP routing and an RPKI configuration. [...]

title: Nigerian hacker arrested for stealing $7.5M from charities
description: A Nigerian national was arrested in Ghana and is facing charges related to business email compromise (BEC) attacks that caused a charitable organization in the United States to lose more than $7.5 million. [...]

title: PornHub blocks North Carolina, Montana over new age verification laws
description: Adult media giant Aylo has blocked access to many of its websites, including PornHub, to visitors from Montana and North Caroline as new age verifications laws go into effect. [...]

title: LastPass now requires 12-character master passwords for better security
description: LastPass notified customers today that they are now required to use complex master passwords with a minimum of 12 characters to increase their accounts' security. [...]

title: Data breach at healthcare tech firm impacts 4.5 million patients
description: HealthEC LLC, a provider of health management solutions, suffered a data breach that impacts close to 4.5 million individuals who received care through one of the company's customers. [...]

title: Nearly 11 million SSH servers vulnerable to new Terrapin attacks
description: Almost 11 million internet-exposed SSH servers are vulnerable to the Terrapin attack that threatens the integrity of some SSH connections. [...]

title: CISA warns of actively exploited bugs in Chrome and Excel parsing library
description: The U.S. Cybersecurity and Infrastructure Security Agency has added two vulnerabilities to the Known Exploited Vulnerabilities catalog, a recently patched flaw in Google Chrome and a bug affecting an open-source Perl library for reading information in an Excel file called Spreadsheet::ParseExcel. [...]
